snippet: Ms. Boothe’s struggle to recuperate from a paralyzing fall became the subject of the popular 1975 film “The Other Side of the Mountain.”
abstract: Jill Kinmont Boothe, a champion ski racer whose struggle to recuperate from a paralyzing fall on an icy slope became the subject of the popular 1975 film The Other Side of the Mountain, dies at age 75.
lead_paragraph: Ms. Boothe’s struggle to recuperate from a paralyzing fall became the subject of the popular 1975 film “The Other Side of the Mountain.”

headline.seo: Jill Kinmont Boothe, 75, ‘Other Side of the Mountain’ Skier, Dies
headline.main: Jill Kinmont Boothe, Skier in Inspiring Film, Dies at 75
headline.print_headline: Jill Kinmont Boothe, 75, Skier in Inspiring Film
